sentence: Democratic gubernatorial candidates in Florida seized on the leak as a way to potentially shake up a race in which incumbent Republican Ron DeSantis is leading.
author: Elizabeth Findell
title: Gubernatorial Candidates Seize on Leaked Roe v. Wade Draft Opinion
